title: Twisted Fate buff/rework
body: Hey Riot, don't you think Twisted Fate{{champion:4}}  finally needs some buffs or even a rework? he does have a good wave clearance, good magic damage and good crowd control kit. But he is extremely weak when it comes to defense and does not have any  escape mechanism whatsoever. He can barely escape a gank and always needs to have his W ready in order to have a higher chance of escaping so he can either slow them down or stun the enemy jgler or the enemy laner, but even his W takes a long time to roll as well. and his E is almost useless and it takes even more longer to stack if your going for AP Twisted Fate{{champion:4}} , I mean look at his win rate and ban rate, and his popularity, he is extremely difficult to play with and is long due for a buff/rework

replies.body: Definitely does not need a rework. Could do with a slight damage buff and a slight decrease in channel time for his ultimate but apart from that Twisted Fate is a very fun champion to play.

You brought up the things that make him balanced lol

He is a burst mage, he's designed to clear, roam, kill and repeat, having an escape would make him broken, same with having defensive stats any higher than they are.

Stun card - designed for this exact purpose, so that no brain gold or lowers can't just faceroll and win because they have Gold card up always, if you wanna escape a gank, ward, and don't over extend without vision

E - Free gold???? what do you mean useless, he gets 1-6g for any minion he kills with stacked deck or otherwise, its called learning to farm, maybe try it sometime

WR/BR is subjective, and doesn't actually indicated whether a character needs a nerf or buff, unless they are ridiculously low or high

Difficult? No, skill requiring? Yes
